title: Close-up of claimed Huawei Nexus 6 revealed in video leak | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Huawei Nexus6]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Back at this year’s [I/O developerconference](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/google-i-o-what-to-expect), Google revealed that its upcoming [AndroidM](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-m-features) would focusheavily on fingerprint authentication.As such, it would make sense that the company’s flagship smartphones, whichwill likely debut with Android M on board, will feature fingerprint scanners.It’s also worth noting that the handset in the video appears to be quitelarge, which matches rumours that Huawei is building a 5.7in device forGoogle’s Nexus program.   **  Related:[Best Android Smartphones 2015](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-android-phones-1_round-up)**We should also mention that Google has just confirmed LG as a Nexus producerto the [KoreaTimes](http://www.koreatimes.co.kr/www/news/tech/2015/08/133_184309.html) – LGis reportedly building the 5.2in Nexus 5.We’ve yet to receive official confirmation from either Google or Huaweiregarding a Nexus 6 just yet. Stay tuned.**Check out our smartphone group test video:**
